Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.client

Class Fido2Config

java.lang.Object
com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.client.Fido2Config
public class Fido2Config extends Object
A global FIDO2 SDK configuration class. In general FIDO SDK's default behavior is to be as secure as possible. However, sometimes an application may wish to disable a specific security feature or even enhance a security feature. A small set of configuration options are exposed to the application to modify or add to FIDO2 SDK's default behavior.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • setMaximumRetryCount

      public static void setMaximumRetryCount(int maxRetryCount)
      Sets the maximum number of possible retries before incurring a lockout penalty during a user verification process. This value defaults to 5. The minimum possible value is 1 otherwise, the provided value will be ignored. The maximum possible value is 5 otherwise, the provided value will be ignored. This value may only be configured ONCE per application runtime.
      Parameters:
      maxRetryCount - maximumRetryCount The maximum number of possible retries.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setBaseLockoutDuration

      public static void setBaseLockoutDuration(int durationInSecs)
      Sets the base lockout penalty duration to be incurred upon exceeding the maximum number of possible retries during a user verification process. The penalty will increase exponentially with each subsequent verification failure. This value defaults to 30 seconds. The minimum possible value is 30 seconds otherwise the default value will be kept. The maximum possible value is 1800 seconds (i.e. 30 minutes) otherwise the default value will be kept. This value may only be configured ONCE per application runtime.
      Parameters:
      durationInSecs - The base lockout duration in seconds.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setUpSecureLog

      public static com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLog setUpSecureLog(com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLogConfig config)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
